      • hitPlayer

        public boolean hitPlayer(com.adrenalinici.adrenaline.common.model.PlayerColor killer,
                         com.adrenalinici.adrenaline.common.model.PlayerColor victim,
                         int damages)
        This method hits a victim (adding damages). It also mutates killer's marks into damages (in case there's any of it) and then removes it from victim Playerdashboard. In case victim is killed it decrements skulls in Game model, and increments skulls in victim Playerdashboard, then it checks if cruelDamage is present and add a new element to killScore, launching a new GameModelUpdatedEvent. Finally launches a new PlayerDashboardUpdatedEvent of victim's color.
        Parameters:
        killer - player who hits
        victim - hitted player
        damages - number of damages to add
        Returns:
        true if victim was killed

      • markPlayer

        public void markPlayer(com.adrenalinici.adrenaline.common.model.PlayerColor killer,
                       com.adrenalinici.adrenaline.common.model.PlayerColor victim,
                       int marks)
        This method marks a victim after making a check on the number of killer's marks already present on all other PlayerDashboards. Finally launches a new PlayerDashboardUpdatedEvent of victim's color.
        Parameters:
        killer - player who marks
        victim - marked player
        marks - number of marks to add

      • hitAndMarkPlayer

        public boolean hitAndMarkPlayer(com.adrenalinici.adrenaline.common.model.PlayerColor killer,
                                com.adrenalinici.adrenaline.common.model.PlayerColor victim,
                                int damages,
                                int marks)
        This method hits a victim (adding damages). It also mutates killer's marks into damages (in case there's any of it) and then removes it from victim Playerdashboard. In case victim is killed it decrements skulls in Game model, and increments skulls in victim Playerdashboard, then it checks if cruelDamage is present and add a new element to killScore, launching a new GameModelUpdatedEvent. After that, it marks the victim after making a check on the number of killer's marks already present on all other PlayerDashboards. Finally launches a new PlayerDashboardUpdatedEvent of victim's color.
        Parameters:
        killer -
        victim -
        damages -
        marks -
        Returns:
        true if victim was killed
